sentences.en: Believe too, in your entitlement to an easier life.
sentences.cn: 也要信任, 在您享用紧张生的职权上.

sentences.en: Entitlement to concessionary travel authorised by the Boroughs, and they are levied for the associated costs.
sentences.cn: 授予特许旅行由自治市镇管理, 他们是需要收费来承担联合的成本.

sentences.en: Hasn't this politically attractive entitlement simply made the cost problem worse?
sentences.cn: 这种政治醒目的扩大医改覆盖范围的举动是否深化了成本控制问题?

sentences.en: In both situations, the car entitlement is FREE of any import duty, excise duty or tax.
sentences.cn: 在这两种情况下, 汽车都可以减免任何进口税, 消费税与销售税.

sentences.en: Shell has entitlement to about 50 per cent of gas volumes over the 20 - year project lifetime.
sentences.cn: 在20年的项目周期内,壳牌将拥有天然气产量的50%.

sentences.en: They lose their entitlement to welfare when they start work.
sentences.cn: 他们开始工作时就丧失了享受福利的权利。

sentences.en: Tighter rules for benefit entitlement have knocked many people off the unemployment register.
sentences.cn: 更为严格的救济金申领规定将很多人剔除出了失业登记表。

words.tran_cn: 给…权利；给…定书名；授…以荣誉（entitle的过去分词）
称做…；定名为…；给…称号；使…有权利

trans.tran_cn: 授权，应得权益，命名、被定名，资格，政府津贴
trans.tran_en: the official right to have or do something, or the amount that you have a right to receive
